ShortIntro.SecondDescription: customers contact us, we promise top quality and fast delivery!

About.Title: About us
About.About1: is the leading exporter of firewood from Croatia to the German market. Founded in Kutina in 2016 by the owner
About.About2: the company specializes in the distribution of firewood and pellets. With a family history in the timber industry, the couple use their experience to provide quality products and delivery. The company started with exports to Italy, and since then it has expanded to other markets of
About.AboutCountry: Austria, Switzerland, Germany, Belgium, the Netherlands and Saudi Arabia

Certificate.Title: Certificate
Certificate.Text: TIMBER-EXPORT annually delivers 4,000 m3 of firewood and 1,000 tons of Ruf Briquettes. They are also preparing to export high-calorie wood pellets to Italy and Germany. Their wood comes from Croatian forests with FSC certification. TIMBER-EXPORT has its own delivery fleet and cooperates with other transport companies to efficiently fulfill orders.
Certificate.SubText: The project was co-financed by the European Union from the European Fund for Regional Development
